title: Milio
description: A platform to help people book and take a picture in photo booth.
fullDescription:
Milio is an end-to-end photobooth solution that connects online booking with an on-site photo-taking experience. Users reserve sessions via the website, complete payments using QRIS or a payment gateway, and activate their session by scanning a QR code at the booth.
Behind the scenes, a desktop application controls hardware components such as cameras, printers, and projectors, ensuring a reliable and seamless experience, even in large-scale event setups.
outcomes: Integrated payment gateway with QRIS support
Seamless integration with camera, printer, projector, and OBS

title: Antrein
description: A highly scalable virtual waiting-room platform that helps event organizers sell high-demand tickets without their websites going down.
fullDescription:
Antrein is a fault-tolerant virtual waiting-room platform designed to handle extreme traffic surges during high-demand events. It is built using Go-based microservices communicating via gRPC and Server-Sent Events (SSE), deployed on Kubernetes with a custom Go reverse proxy.
The system supports dynamic, event-based infrastructure provisioning, automatically scaling compute resources up and down based on event start and end times to ensure both performance and cost efficiency.
outcomes: Delivered real-time queue updates to users using SSE
Successfully handled millions of concurrent requests
Enabled configurable horizontal scaling via Kubernetes
Implemented multi-tenant architecture with isolated clusters per project

title: Jajaka
description: A mobile app that helps early-stage SME founders make better business decisions through location mapping and ML-powered recommendations.
fullDescription:
Jajaka is a mobile application designed to help people start their small and medium enterprises (SMEs). Built with React Native for the mobile app and FastAPI for the backend, the platform provides location mapping and business recommendations based on data analysis and machine learning.
By leveraging geographic and behavioral data, Jajaka helps users identify suitable locations and make informed decisions when starting their businesses.
outcomes: Delivered ML-powered recommendations for SME location selection
Implemented interactive location mapping within the mobile app
Enabled data-driven decision-making for early-stage entrepreneurs

title: Gwarp
description: A lightning-fast data migration tool that helps engineers and data teams move and sync data across systems reliably and efficiently.
fullDescription: GWarp is a high-performance data migration tool built in Go that enables flexible and reliable movement of data between systems. It supports complex pipelines with multiple sinks and automatic schema detection, and is designed for fault tolerance with resume capabilities. Users can configure migrations using YAML and run pipelines in either interactive or daemon (background) mode.
outcomes: Enabled high-throughput data migrations with automatic schema detection
Supported multi-sink pipelines across databases, files, and streaming sources
Built with fault-tolerant execution and resume on failure
Provided CLI tools for monitoring, logging, and background execution

title: Realtime Data Pipeline
description: A real-time data pipeline that helps analytics and AI teams consume up-to-date PostgreSQL data in BigQuery at massive scale.
fullDescription:
This project involved designing and building a real-time data pipeline to synchronize golden data from PostgreSQL to BigQuery. The system combines an initial large-scale data migration using batch jobs with a streaming pipeline based on Change Data Capture (CDC) to ensure near-real-time consistency.
The pipeline was designed to handle billions of records (~9TB of data) and supports downstream analytics and chatbot use cases requiring low-latency, up-to-date data.
outcomes: Successfully migrated billions of records (~9TB) from PostgreSQL to BigQuery
Built a CDC-based streaming pipeline for near-real-time data synchronization
Enabled real-time analytics and chatbot workloads with up-to-date data
Designed a scalable and fault-tolerant data ingestion architecture

title: Raung Residence
description: A coliving management and booking platform that helps property owners streamline operations and allows residents to manage their stay digitally.
fullDescription:
Raung Residence is a web platform designed to support both coliving residents and operators. Users can browse available rooms, book their stay, access shared facilities such as laundry and cleaning services, and pay monthly rent through an integrated payment gateway.
On the operational side, the platform helps coliving staff manage rooms, tenants, and services efficiently from a single system.

title: Kost Management System
description: A web-based management system that helps coliving operators track residents, manage room maintenance, and monitor payments in one centralized platform.
fullDescription: Kost Management System is a web application designed to help coliving and kost operators manage their daily operations. The platform enables operators to track residents, monitor room occupancy, manage maintenance requests, and record resident payments in a centralized system.

title: Learning Management System - Radiology UI
description: A learning management system that helps radiology PPDS residents manage academic activities and helps doctors to evaluate progress and determine semester outcomes.
fullDescription:
The Learning Management System for Radiology UI is a specialized academic platform designed to manage the learning activities of PPDS (Program Pendidikan Dokter Spesialis) residents. Residents can submit journals, presentations, and academic tasks through the system.
From the doctors’ perspective, the platform helps manage PPDS residents, review submissions, monitor performance, and determine whether residents pass or proceed to the next semester.

title: TBGuard
description: A community-focused landing page that helps raise awareness and improve tuberculosis detection and management in Sampang.
fullDescription: TB GuardRise is a public health landing page built to support a community initiative focused on improving tuberculosis (TB) detection and management in Sampang. The platform includes a content management system (CMS) that allows health teams to easily update educational content, campaign information, and program updates without technical assistance.

title: Mercator
description: A carbon calculator landing page that helps governments estimate blue carbon offsets from mangrove ecosystems to support CO₂ reduction targets.
fullDescription: MERCATOR is a landing page designed to raise awareness of the role of mangrove ecosystems as one of the largest sources of blue carbon. The platform helps government stakeholders estimate carbon stock and sequestration potential based on CO₂ reduction targets and mangrove density.

title: Inclusify
description: A landing page and learning platform that helps children with special abilities learn through games while raising public awareness about inclusive education.
fullDescription: Inclusify is a digital platform designed to raise awareness about children with special abilities while providing a game-based learning experience tailored to their needs. The landing page focuses on education and advocacy, while the learning section offers interactive games to support cognitive and skill development in an engaging way.

title: TEDxITB 5.0
description: An event website that helps audiences register, access event information, and purchase merchandise
fullDescription: TEDxITB 5.0 is an event management and engagement platform designed to support audience participation and internal operations. The website communicates the event’s theme and details, enables registration and merchandise sales, and centralizes payment verification and attendee management through an admin dashboard.

title: SWIC
description: A web platform for the Smarter World Innovation Challenge that supports case competition enrollment, submission, and end-to-end participant management.
fullDescription: SWIC is a web-based competition platform designed to support a global innovation challenge. It provides event information, participant enrollment, and case submission workflows, while offering organizers an administrative interface to manage participants, verify eligibility, and evaluate submissions.

title: Skill Up
description: A web and desktop platform that supports nationwide skill-development programs
fullDescription:
The Skill Up Foundation platform was built to support a nationwide non-profit organization focused on expanding access to education and skill development in Indonesia. The platform includes a public landing page to communicate the foundation’s mission and programs, as well as enrollment flows for webinars, apprenticeships, and academy programs.
To support operations at scale, the system provides tools to organize participants and a desktop-based admin application that enables content management and automatic certificate generation for program graduates.

title: PT. Sanggar Jaya Abadi Company Profile
description: A corporate website that helps PT. Sanggar Jaya Abadi present its products, milestones, and portfolio to build trust with partners and customers.
fullDescription: This company profile website serves as PT. Sanggar Jaya Abadi’s digital presence, highlighting its mission, experience, and partnerships. The site showcases product offerings, company milestones, portfolio projects, and certifications.

title: IOE 2023
description: An event website that helps students access event information and enroll in competitions through a centralized platform.
fullDescription: The IOE 2023 website was built as an event and competition platform to provide clear information and simplify participant enrollment. The site presents event details, competition information, and registration flows, allowing students to easily discover and join the available competitions.

title: DQLC Website
description: A digital assessment platform that helps dentists evaluate patients’ quality of life before treatment to support better clinical decisions.
fullDescription:
DLQC (Digital Life Quality Check) is a digital application designed to assist dentists in assessing patients’ quality of life before dental treatment. The platform evaluates caries-related risk factors such as oral health knowledge, tooth-brushing behavior, and dietary habits, as well as quality-of-life aspects including oral discomfort, emotional concerns, functional limitations, and social impact.
By providing structured pre-treatment assessments, DLQC helps dentists make more informed treatment decisions.
